roleset.name: move at same speed

example.name: the one example
example.text: Earnings-1 continued *trace*-1 to pace sales because of a lower tax rate, profit from the renegotiation of the debt instrument received from Faberge Inc. in connection with Lilly's sale of Elizabeth Arden Inc. in 1987, and net proceeds from the settlement of patent litigation at Lilly's Hybritech Inc. unit.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'pace' based on sentences in wsj.

example.name: nervous Nelly
example.text: John paced the floor all night, waiting for news about whether his dissertation was accepted.
example.arg: waiting for news about whether his dissertation was accepted.
